strings.Value: "Spent all magic again. Almost nothing left."
"Maybe we can plant Nok-Nok in the Technic League? He will run away anyway, but before that those bastards will get enough trouble to cease dealing with spellcasting slaves forever!"
"Heh. Nok-Nok and magic. He-he-he-he... oh, don't give me that look! It even sounds hilarious, aha-ha!"
"A goblin mage... another oddity for my collection of Things-That-Should-Never-Be!"
"You hasten your undoing by dealing with the powers you can't comprehend. However, I am not the one to be unhappy because you chose this path."
"A goblin wielding magic is like a kitten with the head of a dragon: funny — but deadly nonetheless!"
"A goblin wielding magic is like a kitten with the head of a dragon: funny — but deadly nonetheless!"
